Module org.controlsfx.controls
Package impl.org.controlsfx.tools.rectangle.change

Class ToEastChangeStrategy

java.lang.Object
impl.org.controlsfx.tools.rectangle.change.ToEastChangeStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rectangle2DChangeStrategy
public class ToEastChangeStrategy extends Object
A strategy which enlarges an existing rectangle to the east.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Creates a new change strategy which enlarges the specified original rectangle to the east.

  • Constructor Details

    • ToEastChangeStrategy

      public ToEastChangeStrategy(Rectangle2D original, boolean ratioFixed, double ratio, Rectangle2D bounds)
      Creates a new change strategy which enlarges the specified original rectangle to the east. The given ratio is enforced when indicated by ratioFixed.
      Parameters:
      original - the original rectangle
      ratioFixed - indicates whether the rectangle's ratio will be fixed to the ratio
      ratio - the possibly fixed ratio of the rectangle created by this strategy
      bounds - the bounds within which the rectangle can be resized

    • ToEastChangeStrategy

      public ToEastChangeStrategy(Rectangle2D original, boolean ratioFixed, double ratio, double maxX, double maxY)
      Creates a new change strategy which enlarges the specified original rectangle to the northeast. The given ratio is enforced when indicated by ratioFixed.
      Parameters:
      original - the original rectangle
      ratioFixed - indicates whether the rectangle's ratio will be fixed to the ratio
      ratio - the possibly fixed ratio of the rectangle created by this strategy
      maxX - the maximal x-coordinate of the right edge of the created rectangles; must be greater than or equal to the previous rectangle's width
      maxY - the maximal y-coordinate of the lower edge of the created rectangles; must be greater than or equal to the previous rectangle's height

  • Method Details

    • getFixedEdge

      protected Edge2D getFixedEdge()
      Returns the edge which is fixed during the change. Called once when the change begins.
      Returns:
      the edge which is fixed during the change

    • doBegin

      protected final Rectangle2D doBegin(Point2D point)
      Begins the change at the specified point.
      Parameters:
      point - a point
      Returns:
      the new rectangle

    • doContinue

      protected Rectangle2D doContinue(Point2D point)
      Continues the change to the specified point. Must not be called before a call to Rectangle2DChangeStrategy.beginChange(javafx.geometry.Point2D).
      Parameters:
      point - a point
      Returns:
      the new rectangle

    • doEnd

      protected final Rectangle2D doEnd(Point2D point)
      Ends the change at the specified point. Must not be called before a call to Rectangle2DChangeStrategy.beginChange(javafx.geometry.Point2D).
      Parameters:
      point - a point
      Returns:
      the new rectangle

    • isRatioFixed

      protected final boolean isRatioFixed()
      Indicates whether the ratio is fixed. If so, the ratio can be accessed with getRatio().
      Returns:
      true if the ratio is fixed; false otherwise

    • getRatio

      protected final double getRatio()
      The current ratio. Can only be called without exception when isRatioFixed() returns true.
      Returns:
      the current ratio
